channel.title: Why aint i admin?
channel.description: ok so i go into my server files and open up the "characters" folder, go to my name and go to player rights and type in "3" and file save it..i then exit out of that window and go to my compiler and compile my server..then i start my server up and log in and i aint an admin...any help??

item.title: Why aint i admin?
item.dc:creator: @Darth_Mopar Darth Mopar
item.description:
@Darth_Mopar wrote:

Yeah, though I suggest getting a new source, TestScape sucks dick… Get something like Gangscape or Project 16.

Read full topic

item.title: Why aint i admin?
item.dc:creator: @O_M_G1 O M G
item.description:
@O_M_G1 wrote:

… Never use this method of making your self or someone else admin or mod.

Instead, Open Client.java, search admin list, scroll down a bit. Now theres some similar to

if(playerName="something"){
playerRights = something;
}

Just change the name, compile and run.

Read full topic

item.title: Why aint i admin?
item.dc:creator: @P_16 P 16
item.description:
@P_16 wrote:

pimp james:

but…i try to do an admin command like ::pickup 0995 10 and 10 coins doesnt appear…and when i open my character folder back up my lpayer rights go back to 0…wtf lol???[br][size=1]Posted on: July 30, 2007, 05:35:06 PM[/size][hr]do u reccomend i create a new server using a different source??

did u log out when ur making ur self admin??

item.title: Why aint i admin?
item.dc:creator: @Darth_Mopar Darth Mopar
item.description:
@Darth_Mopar wrote:

Hmmm… Have you tried keeping server running, but character is logged off, then typing the playerrights as 3? No compiling is needed. Or… You may have one of those servers where you’re owner but it doesn’t show crown, btw, when going back into character file, is 3 still the playerright?

Read full topic
